articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: EU seeking to launch project to help SA phase out coal at COP26 climate summit - News24
articles.description: The European Union is looking to officially launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
articles.content:
The European Union is seeking to launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: To star gazers: Fireworks show called Northern Lights coming - Phys.org
articles.description: A fireworks show that has nothing to do with the Fourth of July and everything to do with the cosmos is poised to be visible across the northern United States and Europe just in time for Halloween.
articles.content: Wade Kitner looks at the northern lights as he fishes in Ventura, Iowa, on Tuesday, June 23, 2015. A fireworks show that has nothing to do with the Fourth of July and everything to do with the cosmos… [+1926 chars]
